response.overview: Aspiring Florida defense lawyer Kevin Lomax accepts a job at a New York law firm. With the stakes getting higher every case, Kevin quickly learns that his boss has something far more evil planned.
response.tagline: The newest attorney at the world's most powerful law firm has never lost a case. But he's about to lose his soul.
response.title: The Devil's Advocate

titles.title: Devil's Advocate
titles.type: DVD box title & some promotional material
